ygData.subject: Grouping w/ bards (was:RE: [eqbards] Abashi's response to a very well thought out post)
ygData.msgSnippet: *sigh* I myself have a 30 bard and always have trouble trying to get in to a group.  I always wondered why until a couple months ago when it just hit me.  I
ygData.messageBody:
*sigh*
I myself have a 30 bard and always have trouble trying to get in to a
group. I always wondered why until a couple months ago when it just hit
me. I kept getting these groups where people would say, "Wow, your songs
are great. I never grouped with a bard before." I'm not talking one group
a week but several. I usually have to laugh at it . . . level 30+ and
never been with a bard? I guess most people just never played with bards,
they would rather just have a healer/nuker/tank, not something in between.
I even did a "/who all bard 40 60" last night on The Rathe for $hits and
giggles 2200 people . . . 15 players found. It is a shame there are not
many of us out there. I don't remember the 30-40 number but it was around
12-15 people. Granted it doesn't included /anon or /role but still . . .

-Steve


>I can just see this (try to think about it) ;)
>
>If bards are the best grouping class in all Everquest,
>every group should love to have one.
>But in the reality of Norath, a bard can hardly find a group.
>
>So something is wrong, and i know that's not the "a bard can hardly find a
>group"
>
>Nothing to say more.
